web vr scene made with A-Frame, green floor with black road
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

a fork in the road diverges to another road curving away
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

Hereâ€™s an updated version of the A-Frame WebVR scene that includes a fork in the road, diverging into two curving paths. The entire code is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JavaScript.

```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Web VR Scene with Road Fork</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <script src="https://aframe.io/releases/1.2.0/aframe.min.js"></script>
    <style>
        body {
            margin: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            background-color: #000; /* Background color for the body */
        }
        a-scene {
            display: block; /* Ensure the scene takes whole viewport */
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <a-scene>
        <!-- Green Floor -->
        <a-box position="0 0.05 0" width="100" height="0.1" depth="100" color="green"></a-box>
        
        <!-- Black Main Road -->
        <a-box position="0 0.05 0" width="5" height="0.1" depth="100" color="black"></a-box>
        
        <!-- Forking Roads -->
        <a-box position="2.5 0.05 -15" width="5" height="0.1" depth="30" color="black" rotation="0 45 0"></a-box>
        <a-box position="-2.5 0.05 -15" width="5" height="0.1" depth="30" color="black" rotation="0 -45 0"></a-box>

        <!-- Adding some depth to the curved paths -->
        <a-box position="5 0.05 -40" width="5" height="0.1" depth="30" color="black" rotation="0 0 0"></a-box>
        <a-box position="-5 0.05 -40" width="5" height="0.1" depth="30" color="black" rotation="0 0 0"></a-box>
        
        <!-- Camera -->
        <a-camera position="0 2 10"></a-camera>
        
        <!-- Sky -->
        <a-sky color="#87CEEB"></a-sky> <!-- Sky color -->
    </a-scene>
</body>
</html>
```

### Explanation:
- **Floor and Main Road**: The green floor remains the same, and the main road is a wide black box.
- **Forking Roads**: Two additional black boxes extend from the main road to create a fork. These paths are rotated to give the appearance of diverging from the main path.
- **Curving Paths**: Extra boxes are added to give the illusion of the diverging roads extending further into the scene.
- **Environment**: The camera and sky are retained to provide a nice backdrop for the fork in the road.

You can copy this code to an HTML file and open it in a compatible web browser. You will be able to explore the scene, and it will give you a simple visual representation of a fork in the road. Enjoy your journey!
